result.eng: I haven't eaten my breakfast yet.
result.ga: Níor ith mé mo bhricfeasta go fóill
result.orig: Níor ith mé mo bhricfeasta go fóill
result.html: Níor ith mé mo bhricfeasta go fóillI haven't eaten my breakfast yet.
result.ponchtml: Níor iṫ mé mo ḃricfeasta go fóillI haven't eaten my breakfast yet.

result.html: Ith do bhricfeastaEat your breakfast!
result.ponchtml: Iṫ do ḃricfeastaEat your breakfast!

result.eng: I have my breakfast at home.
result.ga: Bíonn mo bhricfeasta agam sa bhaile
result.orig: Bíonn mo bhricfeasta agam sa bhaile
result.html: Bíonn mo bhricfeasta agam sa bhaileI have my breakfast at home.
result.ponchtml: Bíonn mo ḃricfeasta agam sa ḃaileI have my breakfast at home.
